units.title: Aggregate formation (Day -1)
units.text: 2 × 105 cells per mL on 6-well low-attachment plate 50 μM Y27632
units.rationale: Establishes uniform hPSC aggregates needed for downstream differentiation.

units.title: Mesoderm induction (Day 0)
units.text: Start mesoderm differentiation induction 12 μM CHIR99021, 30 ng/mL BMP-4
units.rationale: Activates WNT and BMP pathways to drive hPSCs toward mesodermal fate.

units.title: Vascular lineage induction (Day 3)
units.text: Start vascular differentiation induction 100 ng/mL VEGF-A, 2 μM forskolin
units.rationale: Promotes endothelial and pericyte specification from mesodermal progenitors.

units.title: Embedding of cell aggregates (Day 5)
units.text: Vessel sprouting d5 into collagen I–Matrigel matrix (12-well plate) 100 ng/mL VEGF-A, 100 ng/mL FGF-2, 15% FBS
units.rationale: Provides a 3D matrix and growth factors for vascular network formation.

units.title: Self‑assembly of vessel organoids (Day 10)
units.text: Extract blood vessel networks for blood 38 Vascular networks d10 vessel organoid self-assembly (12-well plate) ~20 min for 1 well (~50–60 organoids)
units.rationale: Isolates individual organoids from the gel for further analysis or transplantation.

units.title: Transplantation into immunocompromised mice (Day 15)
units.rationale: Tests functional integration of human organoids in vivo.

units.title: Wash hPSCs with EDTA
units.text: Wash hPSCs with 0.5 mM EDTA by removing E8 medium and replacing it with 0.6 mL of 0.5 mM EDTA per well of a 6-well plate.
units.rationale: Cleanses cells and prepares them for enzymatic dissociation.

units.title: Resuspend cells in aggregation medium with Y‑27632
units.text: Resuspend the cells in fresh aggregation medium (3 mL per well) containing 50 μM Y-27632.
units.rationale: Ensures cell viability and prevents apoptosis during aggregate formation.

units.title: Add collagen I–Matrigel solution to wells
units.text: Add 0.5 mL of collagen I/Matrigel solution per 12-well plate and swirl the plate equally to distribute the solution in the wells.
units.rationale: Creates a uniform gel layer for embedding aggregates.

units.title: Fix vascular networks for staining
units.text: Carefully aspirate the medium from a well using a P1000 pipette and add 4% paraformaldehyde (PFA) solution in PBS for 20 min at room temperature.
units.rationale: Preserves tissue morphology prior to immunostaining.
